segment.source: Applications Results Pane in Server Management Console
segment.target: Applications Results Pane in Server Management Console

segment.source: Applications Results Pane in Server Management Console
segment.target: Applications Results Pane in Server Management Console

segment.source: Applications Results Pane in Server Management Console
segment.target: Applications Results Pane in Server Management Console

segment.source: The Applications Results pane displays a list of the available applications.
segment.target: The Applications Results pane displays a list of the available applications.

segment.source: Right-click anywhere in the Results pane, except on an application or application group, to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click anywhere in the Results pane, except on an application or application group, to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the list of applications.
segment.target: Refreshes the list of applications.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: For more information about the Export List feature, refer to the documentation for the Microsoft Management Console.
segment.target: For more information about the Export List feature, refer to the documentation for the Microsoft Management Console.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: Arrange/Line up Icons
segment.target: Arrange/Line up Icons

segment.source: Organizes the icons in the Results pane.
segment.target: Organizes the icons in the Results pane.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Management Console.

segment.source: Right-click any application in the Results pane to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click any application in the Results pane to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: Move
segment.target: Move

segment.source: Moves the applications into and out of application groups.
segment.target: Moves the applications into and out of application groups.

segment.source: Copy
segment.target: Copy

segment.source: Copies the application to another Application Virtualization System.
segment.target: Copies the application to another Application Virtualization System.

segment.source: Duplicate
segment.target: Duplicate

segment.source: Duplicates the application in the Results pane.
segment.target: Duplicates the application in the Results pane.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: Removes the application from the Application Virtualization System.
segment.target: Removes the application from the Application Virtualization System.

segment.source: Rename
segment.target: Rename

segment.source: Enables you to change the name of the application.
segment.target: Enables you to change the name of the application.

segment.source: Properties
segment.target: Properties

segment.source: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application.
segment.target: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application.

segment.source: This dialog box has the following tabs:
segment.target: This dialog box has the following tabs:

segment.source: General tab—Displays the application icon, application name, and package name.
segment.target: General tab—Displays the application icon, application name, and package name.

segment.source: This tab also displays the following specific information about the application that you can change:
segment.target: This tab also displays the following specific information about the application that you can change:

segment.source: Version—Enables you to enter the appropriate version number.
segment.target: Version—Enables you to enter the appropriate version number.

segment.source: Select the Enable check box to enable version numbering.
segment.target: Select the Enable check box to enable version numbering.

segment.source: Description—Enables you to enter a brief description of the application.
segment.target: Description—Enables you to enter a brief description of the application.

segment.source: OSD Path—Enables you to enter or browse to the location of the appropriated Open Software Descriptor (OSD) file.
segment.target: OSD Path—Enables you to enter or browse to the location of the appropriated Open Software Descriptor (OSD) file.

segment.source: Icon Path—Enables you to enter or browse to the location of the icon file that you want to associate with the application.
segment.target: Icon Path—Enables you to enter or browse to the location of the icon file that you want to associate with the application.

segment.source: Application License Group—Enables you to select the license group from the drop-down list of license groups.
segment.target: Application License Group—Enables you to select the license group from the drop-down list of license groups.

segment.source: Server Group—Enables you to select the server group from the drop-down list of server groups.
segment.target: Server Group—Enables you to select the server group from the drop-down list of server groups.

segment.source: Shortcuts tab—Displays the check boxes that correspond to the locations where the shortcuts are published.
segment.target: Shortcuts tab—Displays the check boxes that correspond to the locations where the shortcuts are published.

segment.source: You can select or clear check boxes from this tab.
segment.target: You can select or clear check boxes from this tab.

segment.source: File Type Associations tab—Displays a list of the file types associated with the selected application.
segment.target: File Type Associations tab—Displays a list of the file types associated with the selected application.

segment.source: From this tab, you can add, edit, or delete the file type association.
segment.target: From this tab, you can add, edit, or delete the file type association.

segment.source: Access Permissions tab—Displays the list of groups that have access permission to the selected application.
segment.target: Access Permissions tab—Displays the list of groups that have access permission to the selected application.

segment.source: From this tab, you can add, edit, or delete groups.
segment.target: From this tab, you can add, edit, or delete groups.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Management Console.

segment.source: Right-click any application group to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click any application group to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: New Application Group
segment.target: New Application Group

segment.source: Displays the New Application Group Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Application Group Wizard.

segment.source: Add the name of the new application group in the appropriate field, and then click Finish.
segment.target: Add the name of the new application group in the appropriate field, and then click Finish.

segment.source: New Application
segment.target: New Application

segment.source: Displays the New Application Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Application Wizard.

segment.source: Navigate through the wizard to add applications.
segment.target: Navigate through the wizard to add applications.

segment.source: Import Applications
segment.target: Import Applications

segment.source: Displays a browse dialog box that you can use to import existing applications into the Application Virtualization Management Console.
segment.target: Displays a browse dialog box that you can use to import existing applications into the Application Virtualization Management Console.

segment.source: You can import an OSD file or a Sequencer Project (SPRJ) file.
segment.target: You can import an OSD file or a Sequencer Project (SPRJ) file.

segment.source: Move
segment.target: Move

segment.source: Moves the application group into and out of application groups.
segment.target: Moves the application group into and out of application groups.

segment.source: Copy
segment.target: Copy

segment.source: Copies the application group to a new server.
segment.target: Copies the application group to a new server.

segment.source: New Window from Here
segment.target: New Window from Here

segment.source: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.
segment.target: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: Removes the application group from the server.
segment.target: Removes the application group from the server.

segment.source: Rename
segment.target: Rename

segment.source: Changes the name of the application group.
segment.target: Changes the name of the application group.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the application group.
segment.target: Refreshes the application group.

segment.source: If the Results pane is displaying the entire application node, the pane will switch to display the contents of the application group.
segment.target: If the Results pane is displaying the entire application node, the pane will switch to display the contents of the application group.

segment.source: Properties
segment.target: Properties

segment.source: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application group.
segment.target: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application group.

segment.source: This dialog box has the following tabs:
segment.target: This dialog box has the following tabs:

segment.source: General tab—Displays the application group icon and application group name.
segment.target: General tab—Displays the application group icon and application group name.

segment.source: This tab also displays the following, limited information about the application group that you can change.
segment.target: This tab also displays the following, limited information about the application group that you can change.

segment.source: Version—Enables you to enter a version number for the application group.
segment.target: Version—Enables you to enter a version number for the application group.

segment.source: Description—Enables you to enter a brief description of the application group.
segment.target: Description—Enables you to enter a brief description of the application group.

segment.source: OSD Path—Enables you to enter or browse to the location where the OSD file is located.
segment.target: OSD Path—Enables you to enter or browse to the location where the OSD file is located.

segment.source: Icon Path—Enables you to enter or browse to the location where the icon file is located.
segment.target: Icon Path—Enables you to enter or browse to the location where the icon file is located.

segment.source: Application License Group—Enables you to select the license group from the drop-down list of license groups.
segment.target: Application License Group—Enables you to select the license group from the drop-down list of license groups.

segment.source: Server Group—Enables you to select the server group from the drop-down list of server groups.
segment.target: Server Group—Enables you to select the server group from the drop-down list of server groups.

segment.source: Shortcuts tab—Displays the check boxes that correspond to the locations where the shortcuts are published.
segment.target: Shortcuts tab—Displays the check boxes that correspond to the locations where the shortcuts are published.

segment.source: You can select or clear check boxes from this tab.
segment.target: You can select or clear check boxes from this tab.

segment.source: File Associations tab—Displays the list of file type associations.
segment.target: File Associations tab—Displays the list of file type associations.

segment.source: You can add, edit, or delete file type associations from this tab.
segment.target: You can add, edit, or delete file type associations from this tab.

segment.source: Access Permissions tab—Displays the list of groups that have access permission to the selected application group.
segment.target: Access Permissions tab—Displays the list of groups that have access permission to the selected application group.

segment.source: From this tab, you can add, edit, or delete groups.
segment.target: From this tab, you can add, edit, or delete groups.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Management Console.

segment.target: Related topics
